trans-unit.source: Install or update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 安裝或更新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]電腦上的部署。

trans-unit.source: You can use InPlaceHostingManager to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用安裝的寫入程式 InPlaceHostingManager[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以在受控制的系統管理軟體 (SMS) 環境中，或在需要複雜的安裝，執行數個在本機電腦上的安裝前或安裝後作業的情況下，使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您會想要使用這個類別的成員，以特定順序︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of InPlaceHostingManager.
trans-unit.target: 建立 InPlaceHostingManager 的新執行的個體。

trans-unit.source: Download the deployment manifest by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>下載部署資訊清單

trans-unit.source: Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查應用程式可以執行的適當權限，利用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Download and install the application by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下載並安裝應用程式使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: -如果您呼叫這些參數的任何順序，它們將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: InPlaceHostingManager can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it.
trans-unit.target: 可以安裝 InPlaceHostingManager[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，但無法執行。

trans-unit.source: Some methods in this class, such as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>, are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 某些方法，在這個類別，例如<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>，下載會在網頁瀏覽器內執行的 Windows Presentation Foundation 型應用程式時，已保留供。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use InPlaceHostingManager to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 InPlaceHostingManager 下載並安裝應用程式，您必須確定憑證來簽署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]您計劃安裝應用程式已安裝用戶端電腦上為受信任的發行者。

trans-unit.source: For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關受信任的發行者的詳細資訊，請參閱[受信任的應用程式部署概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is currently a product limitation that prevents InPlaceHostingManager from working correctly when you debug your code using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 目前沒有產品限制，當您偵錯程式碼，請使用正常運作時，避免 InPlaceHostingManager [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you debug your application in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您偵錯您的應用程式中[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]藉由使用 F5 鍵，此範例將會擲回神秘的例外狀況時呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To debug using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵錯使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]、 但不偵錯，啟動應用程式，然後將附加偵錯工具。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用另一個偵錯工具，例如 WinDbg。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>下載並安裝指定的瀏覽器裝載應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要下載的 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式裝載 Web 瀏覽器中，會使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A> constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要下載 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>具有建構函式`launchInHostProcess`參數設定為`false`。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (<xref:System.Uri>) to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 統一資源識別元 (<xref:System.Uri>) 至[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式的部署資訊清單。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>只在 Windows XP 或更新版本的 Windows 作業系統中，可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: 無法將傳遞如 deploymentManifest 引數。

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifest使用不支援 URI 配置[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>下載並安裝指定應用程式，可以是獨立的 Windows form 應用程式或網頁瀏覽器裝載的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the deployment manifest of the application that will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 統一資源識別元 (URI) 將安裝的應用程式的部署資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 是否在主應用程式，例如網頁瀏覽器將會執行此應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For a stand-alone application, set this value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 獨立應用程式，將此值設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref> can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>只在 Windows XP 或更新版本的 Windows 作業系統中，可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Cannot pass for the deploymentManifest argument.
trans-unit.target: 無法將傳遞如 deploymentManifest 引數。

trans-unit.source: deploymentManifest uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: deploymentManifest使用不支援 URI 配置[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式具有適當的權限及平台相依性，要在本機電腦上執行。

trans-unit.source: You must call AssertApplicationRequirements after <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> returns successfully.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫 AssertApplicationRequirements 之後<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>成功傳回。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must not call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A> unless you call AssertApplicationRequirements, and it returns without error.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>除非呼叫 AssertApplicationRequirements，而且它會傳回不會發生錯誤。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.DownloadApplicationAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前呼叫此方法會引發<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>方法。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式具有適當的權限及平台相依性，要在本機電腦上執行。

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them.
trans-unit.target: 如果`grantApplicationTrust`是`true`，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>就會授與應用程式提高的權限，則當需要它們。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: This is only possible if <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> is able to grant those permissions.
trans-unit.target: 這樣做才可行，如果<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>能夠授與這些權限。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]為較大的封裝的一部分安裝應用程式和安裝程式授與完全信任，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>能夠授與[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式完全信任。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.
trans-unit.target: 如果`grantApplicationTrust`是`false`，應用程式將不會授與任何權限。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，應用程式會嘗試將它的權限提高為所需層級。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消非同步下載作業。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>所佔用。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>

trans-unit.source: Downloads an application update in the background.
trans-unit.target: 下載應用程式在背景中的更新。

trans-unit.source: You must call this method after calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>之後呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: Raised if this method is called before the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync*> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements*> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果之前呼叫此方法會引發<> *> 和<> *> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 發生於應用程式已完成下載至本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要安裝的 Windows Form 應用程式，您必須指示使用者啟動應用程式本身。您無法使用，以程式設計方式啟動 Windows Form 應用程式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>方法。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式或資訊清單的下載的狀態變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 在主控台應用程式中，事件會指派給執行緒從執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可能會收到進度更新事件失序，後續的事件顯示降低相較於先前的事件。

trans-unit.source: You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue.
trans-unit.target: 因為 Windows Form 中的事件會依序處理，從使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒的訊息佇列，不會看到 Windows Form 應用程式中，這類行為。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 啟動[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式中，如果且只有很 Web 瀏覽器中執行的 Windows Presentation Foundation 型應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是僅適用於 Windows Presentation Foundation 為基礎的應用程式可以裝載 Web 瀏覽器中 (也就是說，其部署資訊清單定義`hostInBrowser`XML 項目)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"></xref> corresponding to the launched application.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"> </xref>對應至啟動的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: 下載部署資訊清單的[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]在背景中，應用程式和作業已完成或發生錯誤時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知此事件完成時，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestCompleted>

trans-unit.source: If this event is called, and no error is indicated by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>, you should next call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫這個事件，而且沒有錯誤會以<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>，接下來應該呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>以確認應用程式必須在本機電腦上執行的權限。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 部署資訊清單已下載至本機電腦時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> to check whether <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully or returned an error.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>屬性<xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs>來檢查是否<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>順利完成，或傳回錯誤。</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.GetManifestCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> is null, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> completed successfully, and you can call <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>為 null，<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A>順利完成，而且您可以呼叫<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.AssertApplicationRequirements%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager.GetManifestAsync%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously installed user-defined component of an application.
trans-unit.target: 移除先前安裝的使用者定義應用程式元件。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the add-in to remove.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含訂用帳戶識別碼，這表示增益集移除。

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is not a valid subscription identity, or does not include a name, public key token, processor architecture, and version number.
trans-unit.target: subscriptionId不是有效的訂用帳戶識別碼，或不包含名稱、 公開金鑰語彙基元、 處理器架構和版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: subscriptionId is .
trans-unit.target: subscriptionIdis .

trans-unit.source: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.
trans-unit.target: 移除[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，包含<customUX>項目。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a subscription identifier, which indicates the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to remove.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含訂用帳戶識別碼，這表示[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]来移除應用程式。
